mapper.insert: INSERT INTO images (image_Id, feed_Id, feed_Order ,is_Thumbnail, image_File) VALUES(image_id, #{feedId}, #{feedOrder:NUMERIC}, #{isThumbnail:NUMERIC}, #{imageFile})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY images.image_id) num, images.* FROM images, colors, feeds WHERE images.image_id = colors.image_id AND feeds.feed_id = images.feed_id AND images.is_thumbnail = 0 AND feeds.feed_state = 0 AND colors.color_r BETWEEN #{startRed} AND #{endRed} AND colors.color_g BETWEEN #{startGreen} AND #{endGreen} AND colors.color_b BETWEEN #{startBlue} AND #{endBlue} GROUP BY images.image_id) temp WHERE num BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY images.image_id) num, images.* FROM images, feeds, categories WHERE images.feed_id = feeds.feed_id AND categories.category_id = feeds.category_id AND categories.category_name = #{keyword} AND images.is_thumbnail = 0 AND feeds.feed_state = 0 ) temp WHERE num BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT temp.keyword_en FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY keywords.keyword_en) num, keywords.keyword_en FROM images, keywords, feeds WHERE images.image_id = keywords.image_id AND feeds.feed_id = images.feed_id AND images.is_thumbnail = 0 AND feeds.feed_state = 0 AND keywords.keyword_en LIKE CONCAT('%',#{value},'%') GROUP BY keywords.keyword_en )temp WHERE num BETWEEN 1 AND 5
